verses.verse: And he <S%G1525>entered<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G4864>synagogue;<s%> and there was a <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G1563>there<s%> which <S%G2192>had<s%> a <S%G3583>withered<s%> <S%G5495>hand.<s%>
And they <S%G3906>watched<s%> him, <S%G1487>whether<s%> he would <S%G2323>heal<s%> him on the <S%G4521>sabbath<s%> day; that they might <S%G2723>accuse<s%> him.
And he <S%G3004>said<s%> to the <S%G444>man<s%> which <S%G2192>had<s%> the <S%G3583>withered<s%> <S%G5495>hand,<s%> <S%G1453>Stand<s%> forth. <S%G1519><s%>

And he <S%G3004>said<s%> to them, Is it <S%G1832>lawful<s%> to <S%G15>do<s%> <S%G15>good<s%> on the <S%G4521>sabbath<s%> days, <S%G2228>or<s%> to <S%G2554>do<s%> <S%G2554>evil?<s%> to <S%G4982>save<s%> <S%G5590>life,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> to kill? <S%G615><s%> But they <S%G4623>held<s%> their <S%G4623>peace.<s%>

And when he had <S%G4017>looked<s%> <S%G4017>round<s%> <S%G4017>about<s%> on them with <S%G3709>anger,<s%> being <S%G4818>grieved<s%> for the <S%G4457>hardness<s%> of their <S%G2588>hearts,<s%> he <S%G3004>said<s%> to the <S%G444>man,<s%> <S%G1614>Stretch<s%> <S%G1614>forth<s%> <S%G4675>your<s%> hand. <S%G5495><s%> And he <S%G1614>stretched<s%> it out: and his <S%G5495>hand<s%> was <S%G600>restored<s%> <S%G5199>whole<s%> as the <S%G243>other.<s%>

And the <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> <S%G1831>went<s%> <S%G1831>forth,<s%> and <S%G2112>straightway<s%> <S%G4160>took<s%> <S%G4824>counsel<s%> with the <S%G2265>Herodians<s%> <S%G2596>against<s%> him, <S%G3704>how<s%> they might <S%G622>destroy<s%> him.

But <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G402>withdrew<s%> himself with his <S%G3101>disciples<s%> to the <S%G2281>sea:<s%> and a <S%G4183>great<s%> <S%G4128>multitude<s%> from <S%G1056>Galilee<s%> <S%G190>followed<s%> him, and from <S%G2449>Judaea,<s%>

And from <S%G2414>Jerusalem,<s%> and from <S%G2401>Idumaea,<s%> and from <S%G4008>beyond<s%> <S%G2446>Jordan;<s%> and they <S%G4012>about<s%> <S%G5184>Tyre<s%> and <S%G4605>Sidon,<s%> a <S%G4183>great<s%> <S%G4128>multitude,<s%> when they had <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G3745>what<s%> <S%G3745>great<s%> things he <S%G4160>did,<s%> <S%G2064>came<s%> to him.

And he <S%G2036>spoke<s%> to his <S%G3101>disciples,<s%> that a <S%G4142>small<s%> <S%G4142>ship<s%> should <S%G4342>wait<s%> <S%G4342>on<s%> him <S%G1223>because<s%> of the <S%G3793>multitude,<s%> <S%G2443>lest<s%> <S%G3361><s%> they should <S%G2346>throng<s%> him.
For he had <S%G2323>healed<s%> <S%G4183>many;<s%> <S%G5620>so<s%> that they <S%G1968>pressed<s%> on him for to <S%G680>touch<s%> him, as <S%G3745>many<s%> as <S%G2192>had<s%> <S%G3148>plagues.<s%>

And <S%G169>unclean<s%> <S%G4151>spirits,<s%> <S%G3752>when<s%> they <S%G2334>saw<s%> him, <S%G4363>fell<s%> down <S%G4363>before<s%> him, and <S%G2896>cried,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> You <S%G1488>are<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>
And he <S%G4183>straightly<s%> <S%G2008>charged<s%> them that they should not <S%G4160>make<s%> him <S%G5318>known.<s%>
And he <S%G305>goes<s%> up <S%G1519>into<s%> a <S%G3735>mountain,<s%> and <S%G4341>calls<s%> to him <S%G3739>whom<s%> he <S%G2309>would:<s%> and they <S%G565>came<s%> to him.
And he <S%G4160>ordained<s%> <S%G1427>twelve,<s%> that they should be with him, and that he might <S%G649>send<s%> them <S%G649>forth<s%> to <S%G2784>preach,<s%>
And to <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G1849>power<s%> to <S%G2323>heal<s%> <S%G3554>sicknesses,<s%> and to <S%G1544>cast<s%> out <S%G1140>devils:<s%>
And <S%G4613>Simon<s%> he <S%G2007>surnamed<s%> <S%G3686><s%> <S%G4074>Peter;<s%>

And <S%G2385>James<s%> the son of <S%G2199>Zebedee,<s%> and <S%G2491>John<s%> the <S%G80>brother<s%> of <S%G2385>James;<s%> and he <S%G2007>surnamed<s%> <S%G3686><s%> them <S%G993>Boanerges,<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> is, The <S%G5207>sons<s%> of <S%G1027>thunder:<s%>

And <S%G406>Andrew,<s%> and <S%G5376>Philip,<s%> and <S%G918>Bartholomew,<s%> and <S%G3156>Matthew,<s%> and <S%G2381>Thomas,<s%> and <S%G2385>James<s%> the son of <S%G256>Alphaeus,<s%> and <S%G2280>Thaddaeus,<s%> and <S%G4613>Simon<s%> the <S%G2581>Canaanite,<s%>
And <S%G2455>Judas<s%> <S%G2469>Iscariot,<s%> <S%G2076>which<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G3860>betrayed<s%> him: and they <S%G2064>went<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> an <S%G3624>house.<s%>

And the <S%G3793>multitude<s%> <S%G4905>comes<s%> <S%G4905>together<s%> <S%G3825>again,<s%> <S%G5620>so<s%> that they <S%G1410>could<s%> not <S%G3383>so<s%> <S%G3383>much<s%> as <S%G5315>eat<s%> <S%G740>bread.<s%>
And when his <S%G3588>friends<s%> <S%G3844><s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> of it, they <S%G1831>went<s%> out to lay <S%G2902>hold<s%> on him: for they <S%G3004>said,<s%> He is <S%G1839>beside<s%> himself.

And the <S%G1122>scribes<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G2597>came<s%> <S%G2597>down<s%> from <S%G2414>Jerusalem<s%> <S%G3004>said,<s%> He <S%G2192>has<s%> <S%G954>Beelzebub,<s%> and by the <S%G758>prince<s%> of the <S%G1140>devils<s%> <S%G1544>casts<s%> he out <S%G1140>devils.<s%>
And he <S%G4341>called<s%> them to him, and <S%G3004>said<s%> to them in <S%G3850>parables,<s%> <S%G4459>How<s%> <S%G1410>can<s%> <S%G4567>Satan<s%> <S%G1544>cast<s%> out Satan? <S%G4567><s%>
And <S%G1437>if<s%> a <S%G932>kingdom<s%> be <S%G3307>divided<s%> <S%G1909>against<s%> <S%G1438>itself,<s%> that <S%G932>kingdom<s%> cannot <S%G3756><s%> <S%G1410><s%> stand. <S%G2476><s%>
And <S%G1437>if<s%> a <S%G3614>house<s%> be <S%G3307>divided<s%> <S%G1909>against<s%> <S%G1438>itself,<s%> that <S%G3614>house<s%> cannot <S%G3756><s%> <S%G1410><s%> stand. <S%G2476><s%>

And <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G4567>Satan<s%> <S%G450>rise<s%> up <S%G1909>against<s%> <S%G1438>himself,<s%> and be <S%G3307>divided,<s%> he cannot <S%G3756><s%> <S%G1410><s%> <S%G2476>stand,<s%> but <S%G2192>has<s%> an end. <S%G5056><s%>

<S%G3762>No<s%> <S%G3762>man<s%> <S%G1410>can<s%> <S%G1525>enter<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> a <S%G2478>strong<s%> man's <S%G3614>house,<s%> and <S%G1283>spoil<s%> his <S%G4632>goods,<s%> <S%G3362>except<s%> he will <S%G4412>first<s%> <S%G1210>bind<s%> the <S%G2478>strong<s%> <S%G2478>man;<s%> and <S%G5119>then<s%> he will <S%G1283>spoil<s%> his house. <S%G3614><s%>

<S%G281>Truly<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, <S%G3956>All<s%> <S%G265>sins<s%> shall be <S%G863>forgiven<s%> to the <S%G5207>sons<s%> of <S%G444>men,<s%> and <S%G988>blasphemies<s%> with <S%G3745>which<s%> soever <S%G3745><s%> <S%G302><s%> they shall blaspheme: <S%G987><s%>

But he that shall <S%G987>blaspheme<s%> <S%G1519>against<s%> the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Ghost<s%> <S%G2192>has<s%> never <S%G3756><s%> <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G165><s%> <S%G859>forgiveness,<s%> but is in <S%G1777>danger<s%> of <S%G166>eternal<s%> damnation. <S%G2920><s%>
<S%G3754>Because<s%> they <S%G3004>said,<s%> He <S%G2192>has<s%> an <S%G169>unclean<s%> <S%G4151>spirit.<s%>
There <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G3767>then<s%> his <S%G80>brothers<s%> and his <S%G3384>mother,<s%> and, <S%G2476>standing<s%> <S%G1854>without,<s%> <S%G649>sent<s%> to him, <S%G5455>calling<s%> him.

And the <S%G3793>multitude<s%> <S%G2521>sat<s%> <S%G4012>about<s%> him, and they <S%G2036>said<s%> to him, <S%G2396>Behold,<s%> your <S%G3384>mother<s%> and your <S%G80>brothers<s%> <S%G1854>without<s%> <S%G2212>seek<s%> for you.
And he <S%G611>answered<s%> them, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G5101>Who<s%> is my <S%G3384>mother,<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> my brothers? <S%G80><s%>

And he <S%G4017>looked<s%> <S%G2943>round<s%> <S%G2945>about<s%> on them <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G2521>sat<s%> <S%G4012>about<s%> him, and <S%G3004>said,<s%> <S%G2396>Behold<s%> my <S%G3384>mother<s%> and my brothers! <S%G80><s%>
